text:
Aw yeah! Because you asked for it today we're 
learning English with the Korean Pop band Black

Pink. So we will learn English with two of their 
most popular songs plus a clip of an interview

they had on Jimmy Kimmel Live but before we get 
into any of that I want to let you know that if

you are new here every single week we teach you 
with your favorite movies, TV series, songs and

so much more so that you can understand fast 
speaking natives without getting lost, without

missing the jokes and without subtitles. Just like 
our fan Jatendra who says that thanks to our art

lessons he's improving his listening and even his 
American accent. You will too. It's really simple

just hit that subscribe button and the bell down 
below and you won't miss a single one of our new

lessons. Alright so now let's start with the 
first song, Ice Cream featuring Selena Gomez.

So do you want to continue learning with the 
song? Then head over to our Instagram and look for

this post where you can learn with the next part. 
Now let's learn with the next song Lovesick.

By the way your ability to comprehend 
connected speech is going to make a huge

difference in whether or not you're able to 
understand natives even when we speak really fast

and this is exactly why it is a fundamental 
part of our Fluent with Friends Course.

Now you can try that course absolutely free with 
our Three Part Master Class where we will help

you to master pronunciation just like this in 
addition to vocabulary and cultural context so

you can understand and laugh with the jokes. So 
if you want to learn more about that and sign up

absolutely free it's really simple click 
up here or down the description below

So we made this lesson talking all about 
discourse markers and why they are so

important for sounding more like a native 
so I highly recommend that you check that

out after you finish this lesson with Blackpink by 
hitting up here or down in the description below.
